We are pleased to announce that Vijay Sankararaman, a renowned expert in digital transformation and supply chain, has joined our Advisory Board.

Vijay is a seasoned product and technology leader with a track record of driving transformative supply chain initiatives across Fortune 50 companies including Walmart, Home Depot, and Lowe’s. He is widely recognized for championing a product-centric mindset and advancing next-generation engineering practices. His leadership has accelerated enterprise-wide transformation through cutting-edge technologies such as AI and ML, cloud platforms, robotics, and automation—redefining customer experiences and enabling frictionless commerce.

Vijay currently serves as a Board Advisor to Retail AI & Analytics Council and the Blue Yonder CEO’s Tech Council. A respected thought leader, he is frequently invited to speak on digital transformation at MIT, and mentors high-growth startups. An alumnus of Harvard Business School, Vijay has contributed meaningfully to the HBS Club of Houston, expanding its community-focused initiatives. His guidance has also been instrumental in steering a private equity-backed startup to a successful IPO.

At Acies Global, we are honored to benefit from Vijay Sankararaman’s visionary thinking, deep industry expertise, and collaborative leadership style as we continue to scale our digital and supply chain impact.

Welcome aboard, Vijay! We’re excited to shape the future together!

#Advisor #SupplyChain #Growth #Board

Today marks the 55th anniversary of #EarthDay! This year’s theme, ‘Our Power, Our Planet,’ calls for urgent global action, particularly championing the push to triple clean electricity generation by 2030. It’s a day that unites over a billion people globally to raise awareness about climate change, resource depletion, and the critical need for environmental protection.

For 55 years, Earth Day has spurred awareness and action. While individual efforts like reducing waste and conserving water are vital, the scale of the environmental challenges we face – highlighted as top global risks – demands a fundamental shift, especially within the corporate world.
It’s time for businesses to evolve beyond traditional ESG reporting and compliance. The real opportunity lies in embracing #CompetitiveSustainability. This isn’t just about reducing harm or ticking boxes; it’s about strategically embedding sustainability into the core of your business model to unlock innovation, build long-term resilience, attract conscious customers and ultimately, gain a decisive competitive edge.
Companies leading this charge view sustainability not as a cost, but as the key to future market leadership. They are asking, “How can we create sustainable solutions and maintain my market?” 

GreenMath, our #Sustainability platform, is our way to help large enterprises move beyond baseline ESG and harness sustainability as a core driver of competitive advantage, innovation, and value creation.

On this #EarthDay2025, let’s commit to using our collective corporate power for the planet. 

How is your organization integrating sustainability not just for compliance, but as a strategic driver for future success? Share your thoughts below! 👇

#EarthDay #ClimateTech #ESG #ClimateAction #BusinessStrategy #Innovation #CorporateResponsibility #RenewableEnergy #Climetrics #GreenMath

Acies Global in the News: Introducing GreenMath.AI – Where Sustainability Meets Strategy 🚀​ 

We’re excited to share that Acies has launched www.greenmath.ai, a first-of-its-kind Competitive Sustainability platform designed to help businesses compete and win through sustainable innovation.

In today’s market, sustainability is no longer just a compliance task—it’s a competitive edge. GreenMath empowers companies to measure, plan, and evaluate sustainable initiatives while ensuring clear RoI and business value.

🍀 Why this matters:
▪️ Transition from mandate-driven to market-driven sustainability.
▪️Communicate the value of eco-conscious choices to consumers, partners, and communities.
▪️Leverage sustainability as a strategic tool, alongside pricing and branding.

As Vineet Agarwal, our Competitive Sustainability Evangelist, says: “GreenMath transforms green initiatives into a winning strategic paradigm.”

Proud to see Acies Global in the spotlight for driving this critical shift. 
👉 Learn more about how GreenMath is redefining sustainability as a competitive advantage: Read the full release here: https://lnkd.in/g6sb_hJX

We are pleased to announce that Rick D. Blasgen, one of the leading authorities on supply chain management, will be joining our Advisory Board.

Blasgen is president and chief executive officer, emeritus, and current strategic advisor of the Council of Supply Chain Management Professionals (CSCMP) in Lombard, Illinois, USA. He is a trusted source, sought out by many as a preeminent strategist and voice for the future of the discipline. His visionary leadership has significantly influenced the direction of supply chain practices on a global scale. His professional experience provided the foundation for CSCMP to bring contemporary supply chain strategies to the forefront and to develop and provide education and focused training to many companies. He oversaw the development and publication of the Annual State of Logistics Report, which offers a snapshot of the American economy via the lens of the logistics sector and its role in overall supply chains.

Blasgen has an extensive background in the supply chain space, having held leadership positions at leading firms such as Nabisco, Kraft, and ConAgra Foods. Blasgen was designated by the US Department of Commerce in 2011 to serve as the Chair of the Advisory Committee on Supply Chain Competitiveness (ACSCC), providing the Administration advice and counsel on issues and concerns that affect the supply chain sector. 

At Acies, we are honored to have Rick Blasgen’s unparalleled expertise and guidance as we scale our impact in the supply chain space.

Welcome aboard, Rick Blasgen!

We’re excited to shape the future together! 

#SupplyChain #AdvisoryBoard #DigitalTransformation #Analytics #Leadership #Innovation #Acies

National Energy Conservation Day: From Thought to Action

This National Energy Conservation Day, we reflect on our progress in addressing climate change. Conserving energy isn’t just a goal—it’s a responsibility to future generations. Small changes like using energy-efficient devices,💡 managing resources wisely, and adopting green energy can greatly reduce our carbon footprint and create a healthier planet. ♻️

We must, however, acknowledge a key challenge: The world is evolving rapidly, and energy sustainability is still an afterthought in organizations. Focus must be on attaining sustainability goals while maximizing both environmental and business value. At Acies Global, we are using advanced analytics and cutting-edge technologies to help make this a competitive advantage.

We leave you with this thought:
"Today's wastage is tomorrow's shortage"

#EnergyConservation #ClimateAction #CorporateSustainability #Climetrics #SustainabilityWithAcies #DataDrivenDecisions
